General.Name: Beijing Comens New Materials
General.Description: Beijing Comens New Materials Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of composite polyurethane adhesives in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers its products for plastic flexible packaging, ink binders, rail, reflective material composites, and laminating iron applications. Beijing Comens New Materials Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 8, Liushui Industrial Zone, Beijing, China, 102502

3.Name: Mr. Xiang Qian  Shi
